meanings.definition: A family of lizards native to the Americas.
meanings.sent1: Teiids are fascinating creatures that can be found in various habitats.
meanings.sent2: I saw a teiids basking in the sun on a rock near the river.
meanings.sent3: The teiids decided to have a family reunion in the desert.
meanings.sent4: The teiids scurried across the sand like tiny dragons.
meanings.sent5: The colorful teiids stood out against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'teiid', referring to any member of the Teiidae family.
meanings.sent1: We observed a group of teiids hunting for insects together.
meanings.sent2: The teiids in the exhibit displayed a wide range of colors and patterns.
meanings.sent3: The teiids organized a parade to celebrate their diversity.
meanings.sent4: The teiids in the terrarium seemed to be having a family gathering.
meanings.sent5: Each of the teiids had a unique pattern on its scales.
